lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Danforth said the corportation was focused in several key areas including defense electronics, financial services, broadcasting, electrical products and services for construction and industrial and utility markets.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Yochum said that at the company's current level of earnings it could comfortably maintain higher debt levels and that Westinghouse will use its debt capacity to improve shareholder value.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Speaking at a meeting for securities analysts, Douglas Danforth, Westinghouse's chairman, said the company's sales growth target is about 8.5 pct a year for 1988 and 1989, "given an economic environment that remains on a moderate growth course."
